medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's abdominal pain began last night around midnight, initially epigastric and right-sided, accompanied by nausea and 2 episodes of emesis. The pain progressed and became unremitting, associated with loss of appetite. The patient mentions some subjective fevers and chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Anxiety, depression; past surgical history includes wisdom teeth excision.
